Package arcade.patch.env.component

Class PatchComponentSitesPatternTri

  • java.lang.Object
    • arcade.patch.env.component.PatchComponentSites
      • arcade.patch.env.component.PatchComponentSitesPattern
        • arcade.patch.env.component.PatchComponentSitesPatternTri
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Component, java.io.Serializable, sim.engine.Steppable
    public class PatchComponentSitesPatternTri
extends PatchComponentSitesPattern
    Extension of PatchComponentSitesPattern for triangular geometry.

    The pattern unit cell is given by: 

        -----------------------------
    \   / \   / \ 2 / \   / \   /
     \ /   \ / 1 \ / 1 \ / 1 \ /
      -------------------------
     / \   / \ 1 / \ 2 / \ 2 / \
    /   \ /   \ / 2 \ /   \ /   \
    -----------------------------
    \   / \ 1 / \   / \   / \   /
     \ /   \ / 2 \ /   \ /   \ /
      -------------------------
     / \ 1 / \   / \   / \   / \
    / 1 \ / 2 \ /   \ /   \ /   \
    -----------------------------
    \ 2 / \ 2 / \   / \   / \   /
     \ / 1 \ /   \ /   \ /   \ /
      -------------------------
     / \   / \ 2 / \   / \   / \
    /   \ / 1 \ /   \ /   \ /   \
    -----------------------------
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • initializePatternArray

        void initializePatternArray()
        Description copied from class: PatchComponentSitesPattern
        Initializes sites in pattern array.

        Sites are defined by copying the pattern unit cell across the array. Values of 1 and 2 indicate which the two lattice indices that border a capillary.

        Specified by:
        initializePatternArray in class PatchComponentSitesPattern
